html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11062023-11-03FIN
ActRetail Payment Activities Act
SubjectRetail Payment Activities Regulations
PrecisRETAIL PAYMENT ACTIVITIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) introduce standards for operational risk management; (2) introduce requirements to safeguard end users' funds; (3) introduce requirements regarding payment service providers' registration with the Bank of Canada; (4) introduce reporting requirements; (5) introduce penalties for violating requirements; and (6) introduce the timelines and information requirements to support the national security review process as part of the Minister's national security authorities under the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0229 Publication Date: 2023-11-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Retail Payment Activities Regulations
precis: RETAIL PAYMENT ACTIVITIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) introduce standards for operational risk management; (2) introduce requirements to safeguard end users' funds; (3) introduce requirements regarding payment service providers' registration with the Bank of Canada; (4) introduce reporting requirements; (5) introduce penalties for violating requirements; and (6) introduce the timelines and information requirements to support the national security review process as part of the Minister's national security authorities under the Act.
